column5: Hello, Me and a buddy are gearing up for our 1st Lac Seul trip in June of 07. We have plenty of time but it sure is fun to plan for. We're looking for a Resort fairly close to the main lake and has some cabins set up with 2 beds. I've done some looking around and most places are geared up for husband-wife combos or filling a cabin with friends. We want the lodging bill to stay under $1000 for the week. Any ideas or past experiences would be great.
Gold Pines camp near Ear Falls is very raesonably priced.
